thread.title: Beijing’s Teenage Political Prisoner

author: wsjcom
title: Beijing’s Teenage Political Prisoner
text:
Bao Zhuoxuan is supposed to be attending high school in Australia. Instead he’s a prisoner of the Chinese state. In a case that highlights the repression sweeping China under Xi Jinping, young Mr. Bao was detained last week in Burma and is now under house arrest in northern China’s Inner Mongolia region.
The 16 year-old’s crime is being his parents’ son. His mother, Wang Yu, is a prominent human-rights lawyer who has defended Falun...
